channel.title: About me on Stefan Haider
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Stefan Haider

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.author: website@haider.io (Stefan Haider)
item.description: I set up this site to host my résumé and write about topics I encounter during my work as .Net developer.

item.title: About me
item.author: website@haider.io (Stefan Haider)
item.description: My name is Stefan Haider. I currently work as a software engineer at SBA Research. Besides I’m finishing my Master in “Software Engineering and Internet Computing” at Vienna University of Technology. If you want to know more feel free to contact me..

item.title: Projects
item.author: website@haider.io (Stefan Haider)
item.description: You can find some of my projects including a lot of university related stuff on my GitHub page.
